news.title: Charlie Kirk murder: FBI release images of suspect in Utah ‘political assassination’
news.summary: The FBI have today released images of who they believe to be the suspect in the murder of political commentator and Donald Trump ally, Charlie Kirk.

news.title: Couple arrested by gardaí investigating alleged perjury in Conor McGregor civil rape appeal
news.summary: Gardaí have arrested a couple who were due to be called as key witnesses in Conor McGregor’s civil rape appeal.

news.title: Gardaí arrest former TD in probe over his dead parents’ pensions
news.summary: A former TD is under investigation for allegedly claiming the pensions of his deceased parents, the  Irish Independent  can reveal.

news.title: Saoirse Ronan and Jack Lowden welcome first child
news.summary: Saoirse Ronan and her husband Jack Lowden have welcomed their first child.

news.title: ‘The penny-pinching has been going on for years’ – Conor Murray criticises Munster’s ‘dud’ signings, coaching churn and cut-backs
news.summary: Conor Murray has criticised the Munster hierarchy for the calibre of signings they’ve made in the last decade, while he also hit out at penny-pinching around travel to and from games in recent years.

news.title: ‘They couldn’t organise a p**s-up in a brewery’ – Roy Keane vents his annoyance at FAI after Ireland’s defeat in Armenia
news.summary: Roy Keane has joined the debate over what needs to happen next with the Ireland team after a week when the latest qualifying campaign fell off the rails, with the focus of his venom directed at the FAI’s decision makers.

news.title: Gardaí encounter drones at scene of search for missing boy in Donabate as new zone marked out
news.summary: Gardaí searching waste ground on the edge of the north Dublin town of Donabate for a boy who is missing and presumed dead have encountered two drones flying over the restricted site in recent days.

news.title: ‘I’m ready to fight’ – Wife of broadcaster Gareth O’Callaghan says after cancer diagnosis
news.summary: Broadcaster Gareth O’Callaghan’s wife, Paula, has revealed she was diagnosed with cancer.

news.title: How do I discipline a teenager who doesn’t care about consequences and just says ‘whatever’ when I threaten punishment?
news.summary: How do you discipline a teenager who doesn’t care about consequences? I hear variations on this question a lot in my clinical practice with teenagers and their parents. When a teenager seems not to care about consequences, it can leave parents feeling powerless.

news.title: Stay Well: I want to use testosterone therapy to restore my libido after menopause. What are the risks?
news.summary: Testosterone replacement therapy (TRT) in menopause is currently a hot topic, with social media chatter suggesting it can turbo-charge libido and that every menopausal woman should be on it.
